== Main Inclusion Report for kmplayer ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/k/kmplayer, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Kaffeine is the current Konqueror video plugin, but crashes often, Kubuntu team wants kmplayer to replace it
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Not in Debian
** Active upstream.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.kde.org/buglist.cgi?product=kmplayer&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard cdbs packaging, standard cdbs patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
